title: Cohort bar plot fails with IndexError: too many indices for array
body:
Hello,

First of all, thanks for the very nice package. I am trying to make a cohort bar plot like in https://shap.readthedocs.io/en/latest/example_notebooks/api_examples/plots/bar.html, but since a few days the code returns the error _IndexError: too many indices for array_ when generating the cohort.

Here is a reproducible example starting from a shap._explanation object _shap_values_

```
cohort_var = 'Sex_ Male' # variable to specify the cohort
cohort_val_to_display_dict = {0: 'Women', 1: 'Men'} # key-value pairs to define the cohort
cohort_val =  [cohort_val_to_display_dict[shap_values.data[i,shap_values.feature_names.index(cohort_var)]] for i in range(shap_values.shape[0])] # list of cohort values
shap.plots.bar(shap_values.cohorts(cohort_val).abs.mean(0)) # cohort bar plot
```


The error is in the generation of the cohort, i.e. in :
`shap_values_cohort = shap_values.cohorts(cohort_val) # generation of the cohort`

Thank you in advance for your help!
